title: Beth Mowins Interview, Week 2 Hot Takes (Football 09/20)
description:
On a packed midweek edition of the Pick Six Podcast Nick Kostos and Will Brinson discuss Ben McAdoo and the state of the New York Giants (6:10), preview the Rams vs 49ers game on TNF (13:00) and talk home underdogs all over the NFL this week. Then Beth Mowins joins the show (20:30-33:00) to discuss being the first female announce ever for NFL on CBS and her debut on MNF working with Rex Ryan. Finally Jason La Canfora and Pete Prisco join Nick Kostos for a game of Hot Take or Just Right? (35:00).  Are the Giants the worst team in the NFC East? Are the Falcons the best team in the NFC? (40:40), Lions a threat to win the NFC North? (44:45), and will the Cowboys chemistry ruin their season? (54:55).

Subscribe to the Pick Six Podcast on Itunes: 

https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/pick-six-podcast/id1263289980?mt=2
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
